fields.description: batch job
fields.name: batch

fields.description: Optional; list of mass or heat sinks and sources
fields.name: gener

fields.description: Hydrogeologic parameters for various reservoir domains
fields.name: rocks

fields.description: Input the parameters for hydrate properties and their behaviors
fields.name: hydrate

fields.description: List of the grid blocks
fields.name: elements

fields.description: List of the flow connections between the individual blocks
fields.name: connections

fields.description: Computational parameters to be executed
fields.name: parameters

fields.description: diffusivities of mass components
fields.name: diffusion

fields.description: list of initial conditions for specific reservoir domains
fields.name: indom

fields.description: list of initial conditions for individual blocks
fields.name: incon

fields.description: Data record (single line) with simulation title
fields.name: title

fields.description: Dynamic memory allocation
fields.name: memory

fields.description: End of code and initiates simulation
fields.name: endcy

fields.description: End of code and skips simulation
fields.name: endfi

fields.description: Optional;Parameters for relative permeability and capillary pressure (reservoir)
fields.name: wettability

fields.description: optional;Provides time-variable conditions at specific boundaries ( of the simulation)
fields.name: boundaries

fields.description: optional;Specifies parameters used by linear equation solvers
fields.name: solver

fields.description: optional;Specification of times for generating printout (output?)
fields.name: times

fields.description: optional; specifies grid blocks for desired time series data
fields.name: elem_time_series

fields.description: optional;specifies connections for desired time series data
fields.name: connection time series

fields.description: optional;specifies sinks and sources for desired time series data
fields.name: sinks and sources time series data

fields.name: subdomains

fields.name: nover

fields.description: optional; one data record for more flexible initialization
fields.name: start or random
